sentences.english: School-aged children and teens need at least 9 hours of sleep a day.
sentences.chinese: 学龄童和青少年每天至少睡9小时。

sentences.english: That is about 3% of the school-age population.
Objective To study the influence factors influencing thyroid volume in school children in iodine-deficient region.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨缺碘地区学龄儿童甲状腺容积的影响因素。

sentences.english: Objective To understand the dental caries status of preschool children in Bao an district ShenZhen city.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解深圳市宝安区学龄前儿童患龋状况。

sentences.english: Generally, nearsightedness first occurs in school-age children.
sentences.chinese: 一般来说，学龄儿童会首先出现近视眼。

sentences.english: Reading can begin with babies and continue throughout the preschool years.
sentences.chinese: 阅读可以从婴儿期开始，并继续贯穿于整个学龄期。

sentences.english: However, preschool children still model themselves in ways that are directly related to the family.
sentences.chinese: 不过，学龄前儿童仍然直接按照家庭关系来塑造自己。

sentences.english: All these 132 children are school-age kids with oldest ones attending middle school.
sentences.chinese: 所有132名孩子都是学龄儿童，最大的上中学。

sentences.english: It can strike children at any age, including pre-school children and even toddlers.
sentences.chinese: 各年龄段儿童均可发病，包括学龄前儿童甚至幼儿。

sentences.english: Or the result of some sort of preschool peer-pressure?
sentences.chinese: 或者受某种学龄前同伴的压力影响的结果？

sentences.english: Objective The aim of this paper is to study the behavior problem and its influential factors in the rural school children.
sentences.chinese: 目的调查农村学龄儿童的行为问题及其影响因素。

sentences.english: Will your preschooler need a tutor?
sentences.chinese: 你的学龄前孩子需要家教吗？

sentences.english: Households having children between the ages of 7 to 12 ate more ham.
sentences.chinese: 有7至12岁学龄儿童的家计单位消费较多后腿肉。

sentences.english: The CYP3A activities of school-age children are higher than those of the students in puberty(P<0.01).
sentences.chinese: 学龄期儿童CYP3A酶的活性比青春期学生高。

sentences.english: PreSchool-Grade 1-Suzy Goose looks around and wishes she could be different.
sentences.chinese: 学龄前级1苏西鹅环顾四周，并希望她可以是不同的。

sentences.english: More comprehensive program of art education from pre-school to professional stages or level, and so on.
sentences.chinese: 全面的课程更从学龄前的艺术教学到专业的表演等等。

definition: tai-pan/business executive/foreign business manager/top class of kindergarten or school grade
to enter a school or college/to go to school for the first time as a child
to enter the next grade school
head of a household/family head/patriarch/parent or guardian of a child
one full year (e.g. on child's first birthday)
to accompany one's child or spouse who is studying overseas/to help a child with their study, reading or practicing together
